name: Ted Lasso Quotes
description: Hilarious, yet motivating quotes from the hit Apple TV show Ted Lasso.
author: Alex Sparkes

quotes.quote: Taking on a challenge is a lot like riding a horse, isn't it? If you're comfortable while you're doing it, you're probably doing it wrong.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: I do love a locker room. It smells like potential.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: You know what the happiest animal on Earth is? It's a goldfish. You know why? It's got a 10-second memory.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: If the Internet has taught us anything, it's that sometimes it's easier to speak our minds anonymously.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: I think that you might be so sure that you're one in a million, that sometimes you forget that out there you're just one in 11.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: If you care about someone, and you got a little love in your heart, there ain't nothing you can't get through together.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: Your body is like day-old rice. If it ain't warmed up properly, something real bad could happen.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: I promise you there is something worse out there than being sad, and that's being alone and being sad.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: I believe in Communism. Rom-communism, that is. If Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan can go through some heartfelt struggles and still end up happy, then so can we.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: There's two buttons I never like to hit: that's panic and snooze.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: If God would have wanted games to end in a tie, she wouldn't have invented numbers.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso

quotes.quote: You beating yourself up is like Woody Allen playing the clarinet. I don't want to hear it.
quotes.author: Ted Lasso
